title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): GA for enterprise secure AI controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
description:
,Enterprise secure AI controls are now available in the Microsoft Edge management service. This feature provides a new dedicated space for admins to manage all AI-related policies in the Edge browser. This will help enhance security and productivity for managed users and devices.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings
